import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from 'react-leaflet' import { useRef } from 'react' import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import './index.scss' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const form = useRef() const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() //service_wathx0b emailjs .sendForm('service_wathx0b','template_lgl18zv',form.current,'Y5GxK_fTt9Nw1545U') .then( () => { alert('Message successfully sent!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('Failed to send the message, please try again') } ) } return ( <>

I am interested in Full time and contacted opportunities in the backend, software Developer and engineering positions

) } export default Contact
